descriptionHtml:
Adds a new companion, an argonian brute called Dragonis. He\'s also bigger than most of the NPCs in Skyrim.

Extract Dragonis.esp to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory.

You can find him in the Winking Skeever Inn at Solitude

This is the 1st ever attempt at any kind of modding i have done so i\'m sorry if it bugs out for anybody..... I have tested it a number of times and it\'s worked fine for me but if anyone has problems with it lemme know.
author: Ravage
